roleset.name: to discharge from military service
roleset.note: DEMOBILIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'demobilize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from demobilize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Abrams said that [Mr. Ortega]-1 is seeking [*-1]to demobilize the Contras prior to the elections [*-2] to remove any pressure [*] to hold fair elections .
example.arg: [*-2] to remove any pressure [*]to hold fair elections
